message: You can have a smaller share, but I'll give you a chance to get something
I'm willing to compromise, but I still want a bigger share
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy
I'm willing to give you more, but not that much more
You're running out of time, I'm not getting any younger
I'll give you more, but I'm not giving up yet
You're almost out of time, this is my last offer
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not giving up
This is my final offer, take it or leave it
